notes.title: Delegation
notes.content: Q. How many programmers does it take to change a light bulb? A. None – It’s a hardware problem

notes.title: Loops
notes.content: How to keep a programmer in the shower forever. Show him the shampoo bottle instructions: Lather. Rinse. Repeat.

notes.title: Arrays
notes.content: Q. Why did the programmer quit his job? A. Because he didn't get arrays.

notes.title: HTTP fetch API
notes.content: Why we should add headers when using the POST method?
